verses.roman:
tṛtīye--haridāsera mahimā pracaṇḍa
dāmodara-paṇḍita kailā prabhure vākya-danda

synonyms: tṛtīye—in the Third Chapter; haridāsera—of Ṭhākura Haridāsa; mahimā pracaṇḍa—very forceful glories; dāmodara-paṇḍita—Dāmodara Paṇḍita; kailā—made; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vākya-daṇḍa—impudence of chastising by words.
translation: In the Third Chapter is a description of the forceful glories of Haridāsa Ṭhākura. That chapter also mentions how Dāmodara Paṇḍita spoke words of criticism to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
